ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would summarize the class by saying that it was based on reading, summarizing, and discussing articles associated with the movements of archaeological theory. I would recommend it to another student because the course does a good job in surveying this field.
It's a must take for anyone interested in archaeology on a more serious level.
Lots and lots of reading that you really have to do in order to participate in discussions. You do a mini presentation on one article a week.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Provided a wealth of information regarding contemporary archaeological theory. Needed for archaeological studies.
This was extremely helpful. I know so much more about archaeology now than I did before.
